articles.title: 'Europe stands with you': EU leaders express solidarity with Ukraine after Zelensky meeting - CNN
articles.description: The Prime Ministers of Poland, Slovenia and the Czech Republic reaffirmed their support for Ukraine amid the ongoing Russian invasion during a meeting Tuesday with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal in capital Kyiv.
